artifact.name: Archaic Petra
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

artifact.name: Blizzard Strayer
artifact.4-piece_bonus: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

artifact.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
artifact.4-piece_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

artifact.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

artifact.name: Emblem Of Severed Fate
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

artifact.name: Heart of Depth
artifact.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

artifact.name: Maiden Beloved
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artifact.name: Noblesse Oblige
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
artifact.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty, Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

artifact.name: Thundering Fury
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

artifact.name: Viridescent Venerer
artifact.4-piece_bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.
